title: Forte Pharma Ultra Boost 4g Immunity Booster on sale in pharmacies
description: Forte Pharma Ultra Boost 4g Immunity Booster stimulates your immune system. Order it in your bio pharmacy online
cleaned_text: What is Forte Pharma Ultra Boost 4g Immunity Booster used for? Forte Pharma Ultra Boost 4g Immunity Booster is a [food supplement](/en/125-complements-alimentaires) developed for people who suffer a loss of form and who wish to strengthen their body to stay strong during the change of seasons, or during periods of heavy stress. Forte Pharma Ultra Boost 4g Immunity Booster combines a 4G Dynamizing complex containing Ginseng, Guarana, Royal Jelly and Ginger in concentrated and ultra-dosed active ingredients dedicated to supporting the immune defences. Need to cope with changing seasons, or during periods of high demand. Don't let [fatigue](/en/303-complement-alimentaire-tonus-vitalite-fatigue) negatively impact your [immune system](/en/369-complement-alimentaire-defenses-naturelles) . How to properly use this Food Supplement that Stimulates the Natural Defences? Adults: 1 effervescent tablet per day maximum. Teenagers and children over 12 years old: half an effervescent tablet per day maximum. To be diluted in a glass of water (200 ml), preferably in the morning. Comment on the recommendations for use and dosage of Forte Pharma Ultra Boost 4g Immunity Booster 30 Effervescent Tablets with our partner Avis checked after your purchase . What is the composition of this Food Supplement that Promotes the Immune System? Forte Pharma Ultra Boost 4g Immunity Booster is formulated with: Acidity regulators (citric acid, carbonates), vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid), fructose, bulking agent (sorbitol), orange (Zingiber vitamin B9 Guarana extract (Paullinia cupana Kunth) (33.5 mg or 100 mg plant equivalent) Ginseng extract (Panax ginseng CA Meyer) (13.35 mg or 20 mg plant equivalent) Freeze-dried royal jelly (6.67 mg or 20 mg fresh royal jelly equivalent) Ginger extract (Zingiber officinale Roscoe) (5 mg or 20 mg plant equivalent) What are the side effects and contraindications? - Internal use - Respect the dosage - Store in a clean, dry place away from heat, light and moisture - Always keep out of reach of children - Pregnant and breastfeeding women seek advice from a healthcare professional - A food supplement is not a medicine, it cannot replace a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle. Presentation - Packaging Ultra Boost 4g Forte Pharma Immunity Booster comes in the form of a box containing 30 effervescent tablets.
